data.message: Grown man telling kids fuck school...pathetic

replies.message: He's a rapper not a parent to your kids.. Thats your job.. If your kid is dumb enough to drop out of school because an entertainer who thrives on conterversey (especially Slim Shady where everything he says is tongue in cheek) said fuck school, than your child is an idiot and probably won't even pass to begin with..

Lol..i cant believe you wasted that much time and sentences writing me such an idiotic statement..get a life bro..get off eminems dick and most of all i was eminem biggest fan back in the day but now that ive grown up then no its not okay to be a grown ass man and profiting off kids like yourselfs lack of intelligence..talk away im no gna waste another second on you
I take it back..i just have to say this..you look like your about.to suck eminems dick in your picture...okay adios fuckface :)

Haha you have got to be a troll.. you hate eminem now yet you're on his page hating on him.. And did you didn't even listen to what I wrote? No because your stubborn and ignorant and don't understand the point of entertainment.. Shock rap and saying that things that are politically incorrect are made to fuck with people of your minuscule intelligence

Haha you are so idiotic and simple minded.. You state that eminem needs to grow up and is a bad influence to kids yet you are making fun of a 16 year old kid's appearance whom in which struggles with self image, haha
Respect to kamill, u need to reply to all these other comments with complaints if people would just remember were the shirt actually came from then they wouldn't be such assholes
Quit saying its pathetic it's just a t-shirt I mean just cuz it's on a shirt would u guys not go and graduate?
Everybody here wants to suck eminems D..lol
